definitions.title: vb. uncover, remove
definitions.body: (NH id., cf. Ar. jala0 be or become clear, uncovered; display, reveal, declare; go forth, emigrate; cf. Eth galawa: obducere, velare, & II. galaya: in deriv. (rare) Di:1141; Aram. [[גְּלָא]], glo0 reveal)—

[[גׇּלָה אׂזֶן]] uncover the ear of one, i.e. reveal to him 1Sa 9:15, 1Sa 20:2, 1Sa 20:12, 1Sa 20:13, 1Sa 22:8, 1Sa 22:8, 1Sa 22:17, 2Sa 7:27, 1Ch 17:25, Ru 4:4, Job 33:16, Job 36:10, Job 36:15; [[גְּלוּי עינים]] uncovered of eyes, having the eyes open Nu 24:4, Nu 24:16; [[גׇּלָה סוֹד]] reveal a secret Am 3:7, Pr 20:19; [[הגלוי]] the revealed  opp. [[הֶחָתוּם]] Je 32:11; [[גׇּלוּי לְ]] disclosed, published Es 3:14, Es 8:13.
intr. remove, depart, [[גלה משׂושׂ]] [[הארץ]] the mirth of the land is departed Is 24:11; [[יגל]] [[יבול ביתו]] the increase of his house shall depart Job 20:28; [[גלה חחיר]] Pr 27:25.
refl.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: uncover oneself (one's nakedness) 2Sa 6:20.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: discover or shew oneself Is 49:9, [[אֶל]] 1Sa 14:8, 1Sa 14:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: reveal himself (of God), [[אֶל]] Ge 35:7 (E) 1Sa 2:27 1Sa 3:21, [[באזני]] Is 22:14.
pass.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: be uncovered (one's nakedness), [[ערוה]] Ex 20:26 (E) Is 47:3, Ez Eze 16:36, Eze 23:29, [[שׁולים]] Je 13:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be disclosed, discovered, foundations 2Sa 22:16 (= Ps 18:16) Ez Eze 13:14; gates of death Job 38:17, [[עון]]Ho 7:1, [[פשׁע]] Ez Eze 21:29, [[רעה]] Pr 26:26, Ez Eze 16:57.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: be revealed ´[[כבוד י]] Is 40:5, ´[[זרוע י]] Is 53:1, ´[[דבר י]] 1Sa 3:7, [[חדקה]] Is 56:1; with [[לְ]] Is 23:1, Da 10:1, [[הַנִּגְלֽת]] the things revealed De 29:28.
be removed, [[דּוֹרִי נִסַּע וְנִגְלָה מִנִּי]] my habitation is plucked up and removed from me Is 38:12.
uncover,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: nakedness (oft = contract marriage, RSLag:GN 1882, 408; JPh ix. 94) Le 18:6–Le 18:19 Le 20:11–Le 20:21 (H 23 t.) Ez Eze 22:10; cf. [[כנף אביו]] De 23:1, De 27:20; of exposure, as a reproach, Ez Eze 16:37, Eze 23:10, cf. [[נבלת]] Ho 2:12, [[שׁולים]] Na 3:5; immodesty Ez Eze 23:18, [[מקור דמיה]] Le 20:18 (H), [[תזנותיה]] Ez Eze 23:18; ´[[ג]] alone Is 57:8 (all subj. fem.)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in gen.: feet Ru 3:4, Ru 3:7, leg Is 47:2, vail v:Is 47:2 (i.e. remove it) cf. Is 22:8, [[פני]] [[לבושׁו]] Job 41:5, eyes Nu 22:31 (E) Ps 119:18 (open them so as to see).
disclose, discover, lay bare, secret places Je 49:10, deep places Job 12:22, foundations Mic 1:6, blood Is 26:21, iniquity Job 20:27, secret Pr 11:13, Pr 25:9, a wanderer (betray) Is 16:3.

make known, shew, reveal, [[רִיב אֶל]] make known a cause unto Je 11:20, Je 20:12; with [[לְ]] Job 33:6; [[גִּלָּה חִדְקָתוֹ לעיני]] shew his righteousness in the eyes of Ps 98:2; with [[עָל]]:[[על עון ]], [[על חטאת]] make known concerning, iniquity, sin La 2:14, La 4:22.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[גֻּלְּתָה]] be uncovered Na 2:8; Pt. [[תּוֹכַחַת מְגֻלָּה]] open rebuke Pr 27:5.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הָגְלָה]] Es 2:6; f. [[הָגְלְתָה]] Es 2:6, [[הָגְלוּ]] 1Ch 9:1, Je 40:7, [[הָגְלָת]]Je 13:19, Je 13:19 (Ges:§ 75, R. 1); Pt. pass. [[מֻגְלִים]] Je 40:1 carried into exile.

definitions.title: Hithp. 1.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּתְגַּל]] was uncovered (naked) Ge 9:21.
Inf. [[בְּהִתְגַּלּוֹת לִבּוֹ]] that his heart may reveal itself Pr 18:2.
